name: WaterFight!
description:
WaterFight! is a 3D arcade style game inspired from games such as Bomberman and PopTag! Players will fight each other using water balloons. Up to six players can play online and choose between three maps. Customize your player color and choose from ten different colors. Players can pickup powerups by destroying objects such as crates to make themselves more powerful. Powerups include, getting an extra water balloon, increased water radius, increased throwing strength, shields, and health. Players can get hit three times before they get eliminated. Last person alive wins.
